title: Delicate Gold & Diamond Ear Crawler Earrings - Andala Kempulu
features: These elegant ear crawlers feature a slender, curved gold vine design, delicately set with sparkling CZ diamonds. The modern climber style gracefully accentuates the ear's curve. The use of Hyderabadi Polish ensures a lasting shine and rich luster, reflecting our region's renowned craftsmanship.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or adding a touch of subtle glamour to special occasions like cocktail parties
description: This piece blends contemporary design with the timeless appeal of gold and diamonds. The ear crawler style is both fashionable and comfortable, allowing you to make a statement without sacrificing ease of wear. The Hyderabadi polish ensures longevity and a luxurious finish. A perfect gift or addition to your own collection.
